channel.title: CLI on AshLogs
channel.description: Recent content in CLI on AshLogs

item.title: Introducing Nushell
item.description: Introduction to Nushell, a modern cross-platform shell written in Rust that treats everything as structured data. Compare traditional Bash workflows with Nushell's intuitive table-based approach.

item.title: Scripting with Rust: A basic Guide
item.description: Learn how to use Rust for scripting tasks. Covers primitive Rust scripts with rustc, cargo-script for dependency management, and practical examples of file operations and testing.
